entry.title: Buy my Art
entry.summary: Most of the images on this website are for sale in one form or another, if you wish to purchase…
entry.content:
Most of the images on this website are for sale in one form or another, if you wish to purchase an original oil painting or order a Fine Art quality stretcher-framed canvas print prices start from £300. If you want to commission a picture, once again, prices begin at £300. If you want a simple image painted onto a garment prices begin at £200. The pictures in Recent and certain other paintings are not yet for sale.

Please contact me for more information.

entry.title: Recent
entry.summary: The pictures in this gallery are all items that I have worked on over the last two years. The paintings…
entry.content: The pictures in this gallery are all items that I have worked on over the last two years. The paintings featured here have been photographed by me and are not of the best quality, I will have better images soon.

entry.title: Fantasy
entry.summary: This gallery features various pictures with elements of the fantastic. Orpheus playing to the Animals – oil on panel –…
entry.content: This gallery features various pictures with elements of the fantastic.

entry.title: City & Landscape
entry.summary: A selection of the many landscapes and city subjects that I hve painted over the years. Some of these pictures…
entry.content: A selection of the many landscapes and city subjects that I hve painted over the years. Some of these pictures are painted from life and others have been composed using photographic references.

entry.title: Abney Park
entry.summary: I live near Abney Park, a rambling overgrown Victorian cemetery, which has always fascinated me. All of these pictures with…
entry.content: I live near Abney Park, a rambling overgrown Victorian cemetery, which has always fascinated me. All of these pictures with the exception of  'A Dead Tree' have been composed using various photographic references.

entry.title: Portraits
entry.summary: I have painted numerous portraits over the years including many commissions. Most of these pictures have been painted from life…
entry.content: I have painted numerous portraits over the years including many commissions. Most of these pictures have been painted  from life with photographic references to help with working out the backgrounds.

entry.title: Self Portrait
entry.summary: I've painted many self portraits over the years. Self Portrait holding a lily – oil on panel – 41 x…
entry.content: I've painted many self portraits over the years.

entry.title: Miscellaneous
entry.summary: This gallery contains a variety of pictures both old and new, including a few of my drawings. Butsudan – oil…
entry.content: This gallery contains a variety of pictures both old and new, including a few of my drawings.

entry.title: Fabric Painting
entry.summary: Most of the images in this gallery are painted onto T shirts using Pebeo fabric paint. Many of the subjects…
entry.content: Most of the images in this gallery are painted onto T shirts using Pebeo fabric paint. Many of the subjects reflect my interest in reggae music.
